comments:
Build ID: I20070503-1400

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a new (RCP) plug-in project using the "Hello RCP" template
2. When the PDE editor opens, click on the "Launch an Eclipse application" link under the Testing section
3. While the RCP app is open, hover over the Run toolbar button.  An error dialog appears stating a Problem Occured with 'Compute launch button tooltip', Reason: java.lang.NullPointerException.

I didn't see this error with build: I20070323-1616

Log details:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-05-17 13:46:30.446
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Compute launch button tooltip".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.contextlaunching.LaunchingResourceManager.appendLaunched(LaunchingResourceManager.java:229)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.contextlaunching.LaunchingResourceManager.computeLabels(LaunchingResourceManager.java:199)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.contextlaunching.LaunchingResourceManager$2.run(LaunchingResourceManager.java:120)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

The npe was address by the fix in bug 183509. We were not checking for a null launch configuration assocaited with a launch, which resulted in the NPE.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 183509 ***
